HTMLLabelElementForm.summary:
The read-only HTMLLabelElement.form property returns an
object which represents the form of which the label's
associated control is a part, or null if there is either no associated control, or if
that control isn't in a form.

remarks.para: This property is just a shortcut for HTMLLabelElement.control.form.

HTMLLabelElementForm.value:
An which represents the form with which the label's
is associated. If
is null (meaning the
label isn't associated with a control), or if the control isn't part of a form, this
property returns null.
